# LaserEngraver
RP2350 based fiber galvo laser engraver controller firmware, implementing the standard LMCV4 USB interface (lightburn compatible)

Work in progress. 
## Features
* presents a USB interface identical to the standard BJJCZ laser control board (not compatible with EZCAD2)
* lightburn supported as a USB-lite laser controller
* XY2-100 galvo control signals generated by the PIO module
* deep job queue for smooth operation
* multi core processing separates usb interface and hardware control
